name: Broccoli Pasta
description: This vegan broccoli pasta with mushrooms makes the perfect weeknight dinner for the whole family! It's super creamy, healthy, rich, and very easy to make. 15 minutes is all you need!

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to the instructions. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the creamy cashew sauce. Place all ingredients in a high speed blender and process until smooth. If you want to make it easier for your blender, you could soak the cashews overnight in cold water or 30 minutes in hot water. However, this step is not necessary if you use a Vitamix or a similar blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the broccoli into small florets. Slice the mushrooms. Cook the broccoli either in a bit of water or in an Instant Pot. Heat some oil in a large pan and sauté the mushrooms for about 3 minutes on high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Divide the broccoli into small florets. Slice the mushrooms. Cook the broccoli either in a bit of water or in an Instant Pot. Heat some oil in a large pan and sauté the mushrooms for about 3 minutes on high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cashew sauce to the sautéed mushrooms.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cashew sauce to the sautéed mushrooms.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for about 2 minutes. The sauce with thicken up considerably.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for about 2 minutes. The sauce with thicken up considerably.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the cooked pasta and the broccoli. Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Sprinkle with freshly chopped parsley. Enjoy!
